text: <@UGDF9EBPW> thanks for your reply. Are you able to address the discrepancy between sandbox/prod Settings/Pages CSS? See attached. I have indeed fetched all assets. But the main.css is loaded in Settings/Pages.

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/create-edit-and-attach-css-files-to-style-your-site>
Maybe this is why? I'm trying to do local/sandbox dev on a "Marketing Basic" product site that has this feature. Is this not possible to do then?

Ok, I think as an alternative on Sandbox, place `<link rel="stylesheet" ....`  code into the Site header HTML field under Settings/Pages. I was worried about Sandbox and Prod code diverging, but this is avoided here as this HTML field is stored exclusively with the Sandbox site deployment (nothing should need to be changed in the repo)
